<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/board-meeting/pre-call"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Generate pre-call intelligence playbook for Ruben voice agent.

Runs a lightweight Level 0 board meeting analysis to produce
talking points, objection handlers, and opening hooks for a lead.

DYN-100: Pre-call endpoint
DYN-101: n8n integration (called during 60s wait before call)
DYN-102: Enriched metadata for Ruben
DYN-103: Playbook quality scoring
